name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: A gentle, foaming cleanser that deeply hydrates and soothes skin while removing excess oils and impurities.

name: Retinol Serum
description: Our Retinol Serum is formulated with a 2.5% Retinol Complex that provides both immediate and long term release to promote radiant skin.

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: An antioxidant-rich vitamin C serum that helps to brighten the complexion and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

name: Hydrating Face Moisturizer
description: A lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer that provides intense hydration and moisture to your skin.

name: Exfoliating Face Scrub
description: A gentle exfoliating scrub that removes dead skin cells to reveal a brighter, smoother, more radiant complexion.

name: Anti-Aging Eye Cream
description: A powerful anti-aging eye cream designed to restore youthful vitality to the delicate skin around the eyes.

name: Brightening Face Mask
description: A brightening face mask that helps to refresh the skin and improve overall skin radiance.

name: Purifying Clay Mask
description: A purifying clay mask designed to reduce the appearance of pores and detoxify the skin.

name: Daily Sunscreen SPF 50
description: A broad-spectrum sunscreen that provides superior protection from the sun's harmful rays while nourishing the skin.

name: Hydrating Lip Balm
description: A hydrating lip balm enriched with natural oils to soothe and condition lips.
